Levels.AD1: cross-sectional study of ArcA[beta] transgenic model of Alzheimer's disease
Levels.AD2: single time point study of ArcA[beta], PSAPP, E22[delta]A[beta] transgenic model of Alzheimer's disease
Levels.AD3: two time points longitudinal study of 3xTgAD transgenic model of Alzheimer's disease
Levels.aes2: mice anesthestized with different protocols and awake condition
Levels.CSD1: mice undergoing the chronic social defeat paradigm and control condition

ID.Description: scan ID corresponding to naming in data/ diagnostic/ motion/ and timeseries/ folders

subject.Description: subject name as listed in the original dataset

session.Description: imaging session as listed in the original dataset

age.Description: age in months at the time of the acquisition

Levels.E22DAB: E22[delta]A[beta] mice carrying the Osaka and Sweedish mutations in the hAPP gene
Levels.PSAPP: PSAPP[delta]E9 mice carrying the Sweedish mutations in the hAPP gene and the [delta]E9 mutation in the PS1 gene
Levels.ArcAbeta: ArcA[beta] mice carrying the Arctic and the Sweedish mutations in the hAPP gene
Levels.3xTG: 3xTgAD mice carrying the Sweedish mutation in the hAPP gene, the M146V mutation in the PS1 gene, and the P301L mutation in the MAPT gene

Levels.CPS_exp: animals undergoing the chronic social defeat paradigm
Levels.awake: mice imaged in awake condition following aclimatization without head-fixation
Levels.mediso: mice imaged under 0.5% isoflurane and 0.05mg/kg medetomidine

mediso_ctl.Description: animal to be considered as control animals under the standard mediso anesthesia protocol

Coil.Description: MRI reciever coil is cryoprobe phased-array reciever-only coil

sequence.Description: MRI sequence. Single-echo Gradient-echo Echo Plannar Imaging

Levels.awake: mice imaged in awake condition following aclimatization without head-fixation
Levels.mediso: mice imaged under 0.5% isoflurane and 0.05mg/kg medetomidine

publication_PMID.Description: reference publication Pubmed ID for the corresponding dataset

publication_DOI.Description: reference publication DOI for the corresponding dataset
